website_summaries.verdict: The Pentax K-5 II is a top-notch D-SLR when it comes to still capture, but its video performance is disappointing in comparison.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera and a quality replacement for my broken K-50
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera and a quality replacement for my broken K-50. I should have bought the K-5 from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Pentax Camera Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera I have Owned.
customer_reviews.text: And I have been taking pictures for over 35 years. I am a Pentax user, and have lenses that date back to 1948 that work on this camera. The low light focusing ability is outstanding, the shutter whispers, and it is great for sports and wildlife photography. This is a fully customizable professional level camera. I wouldn't recommend jumping to this level if you are a point and shoot photographer. Try the Pentax k-30, k-50, or k-500 instead. You won't miss having a full frame camera.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: K-5
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional camera that is well built and produces exceptional photos with the minimum of effort. While out on my first shoot of Santa and the kids a child accidentally pulled the camera off of a chair. It hit the floor and bounced a couple of times. My heart fell into my socks. I picked up the camera, wiped it off and took some test photos. It worked quite well for the rest of the shoot. I am confident in saying it is rugged, also.
customer_reviews.author: Smeckatella

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera, very pleased
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about any good DSLR. They take nice pictures under a variety of conditions and are very durable. I chose the Pentax K-5 because it is configured in a more durable body than many of the competition and because the ergonomics were to my liking. I paired this body with a used Sigma short zoom lens (also purchased through Amazon) and have a very nice walk-around camera system. I also purchased a Pentax 35mm prime lens for low-light and "street" photography. A very nice package.
customer_reviews.author: DrBob

customer_reviews.title: Built to last, it is capable of taking pictures to last as well.
customer_reviews.text: Great for low light, great in general. A worthy successor to my (in dslr years) ancient but beloved K10D and lost K20D. Smaller, slightly less comfortable to hold. The K10D and K20D felt supremely comfortable and secure in my hand, even when going down the moguls on skis. I have yet to test this one in that fashion, but it seems equally able to survive a 50 yard tumble down the slope, when my grip on it turned out to be somewhat less secure that it felt, with only a cracked lens hood.
customer_reviews.author: Fordhouse

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected and more
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a K100D. The online reviews say it all. It is nice to be able to use old Pentax lenses and still take advantage of shake reduction. Ergonomics and menus are much improved/
customer_reviews.author: duane dewald

customer_reviews.title: Excellent upgrade from older Pentax DSLR
customer_reviews.text: I have used a K20D for several years, until I noticed color fringing on random images. It is not worth the expense to repair when I can upgrade and still use many lenses, including some cult classic K mount ones such as a Vivitar 90mm Series I. So far I am very pleased with the newer model.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Detling

customer_reviews.title: Just Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Change my old pentax kx, it is a great jump, everything changes, quality and image resolution is awsome. Body feels robust in hands. 16mpx is more than enough for a hobbie. Im completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Pentax K-5 II Body.. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Have two so that I don't have to change lens.. Love the Weather resistance features as I work and shoot pictures in both Hot, Humid and Dusty climates. Excellent response and picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: ... received the Pentax k-5 II and the camera looks great. I think I will really enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Pentax k-5 II and the camera looks great. I think I will really enjoy it. However, the manual is another matter. I have purchased cameras before and I have always gotten a manual in English. The manual that came with the camera is in Japanese and not English. I know the camera was shipped from Japan, but it was being delivered to the United States. I really could use a manual in English. Neil Rozier
customer_reviews.author: Neil L. Rozier

customer_reviews.title: Top of the Line
customer_reviews.text: Very nice body, lots of features. Manual needs to be improved. Had to order a book on the K-7 to make sense of the menus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great purchase !!!
customer_reviews.text: I,m user of Pentax system from 1975. I started with Spotmatic to LX in 35 mm photography. Then 6x7 system, I,m using 'till today. Now I can use all my lenses with new Pentax K-5 II including lenses from Pentax 6x7 with special adapter. So my words are - I love it. with regards Ben Malolepszy.
customer_reviews.author: bonifacy

customer_reviews.title: Escstatic!
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding camera! I am a professional photographer and have debated the use of Pentax vs other known brands and found that this is the perfect camera for my business. I primarily shoot portraiture along with some landscape and wildlife. I have found that this cameras abilty to shoot all genre of photography far exceeds some of the noteworthy full-frame cameras. The greates plus is the cost. When comparing the various makes on the market and the cost of each as opposed to their capabilities, THIS IS THE ONE TOO BUY! Great color, great fps, ease of use, and weight/bulk. Recommend this for all photography enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mahr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent SLR
customer_reviews.text: After the Pentax Ist D* I had for over 6 year, an excellent new SLR that meets all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Visser

customer_reviews.title: A paper copy in English would be useful to me
customer_reviews.text: only disapointment is that the paper copy of the operation manual is in Japanese and all I get is the PDF version of it, on line. A paper copy in English would be useful to me.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: I have upgraded from my old K-7 to this one and absolutely love it. It really is a couple of steps up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pantax K-5 II
customer_reviews.text: I have had Pentax cameras for quite awhile, the K-5 II is one of their best ! This is an excellent camera Pentax has done it right.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding semi-pro DSLR
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing and refined DSLR. It never missed focus even under low light. I used it in near darkness, and under low tungsten light. High ISO is impressive. The image quality is excellent. I love the in-body stabilization, the quiet shutter, and the weather sealing. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Chalk

customer_reviews.title: SURPASSED ALL EXPECTATIONS
customer_reviews.text: I orderd on one day & rcvd... the next! have taken some action shots at a football game.... scenic views in the mountains... has renewed my interest in photography solid solid build...just like my Spotmatic I bought in 1969 an 3-4 more since.
customer_reviews.author: JIM KUYPER

customer_reviews.title: Expected much
customer_reviews.text: Not disappointed. Noticeably better focusing than my prior K7. Sharper images (not sure why, however). Otherwise, handles very much like the K7.
customer_reviews.author: Eilert O.

customer_reviews.title: Pentax makes great gear period!
customer_reviews.text: I thought K7 was great. K5II is even better. The build quality is amazing as are the electronics and 3" display
customer_reviews.author: Phil B.

customer_reviews.title: Welcome moderate upgrades of an already . . .
customer_reviews.text: . . . excellent camera. Used my K-5 in Costar Rica with excellent results. My 15-year old granddaughter demonstrated outstanding artistic and technical ability on that trip so I bought the K-5 II and passed the K-5 on to her to add to her kit. The K-5 has some welcome improvements, but I really wanted an excuse to pass on the K-5 to her, and this was a good opportunity to do that. Both of us are pleased with the K-5 versions - whisper-quiet shutter for nature photography, rapid autofocus for action, plenty of MPs for cropping and extensive enlarging, etc. By the way, we have installed KatzEye OptiBrite precision focusing screens for improved accuracy and tack-sharp manual focusing.
customer_reviews.author: R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Open box?
customer_reviews.text: Box beat up. Think it might have been open box, although not noted. Love the camera...can't beat Pentax for the price.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: good camera, but found a dead spot。
customer_reviews.text: good camera, but found a dead spot in lcd and gray light at the corner, not much hassle to get it returned and fixed.
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera after using the K100D for about 6 years. Takes great photos and is simple to use after learning controls on the K100D. Fits my hand great.
customer_reviews.author: lwood10

customer_reviews.title: excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Has a lot of features and capabilities. One of the best features is that you can use all of your older Pentax lens. Good sold camera
customer_reviews.author: Budleys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels so nice in hands hard frame can take huge pounding from big group of ppl
customer_reviews.author: bigdaddy

product_meta.title: Pentax K-5 II 16.3 MP DSLR Body Only (Black) (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description: This new dustproof, weather-resistant and cold-resistant camera includes a newly developed SAFOX X AF sensor that delivers the broadest autofocusing EV range (-3 EV to +18 EV) in its class. The new PENTAX K-5 II / K-5 IIs offer a compact, solid body that delivers high quality image reproduction, especially when working in low light conditions. The camera’s new, highly sensitive AF sensor enables photographers to work with a luminous flux based on F2.8 levels in addition to F5.6, which increases the AF accuracy when using fast lenses. The AF sensor also includes an upgraded AF algorithm as well as the Select-Area Expansion feature, which automatically tracks the subject when it deviates from a pre-assigned selection point, by assessing data from neighboring sensors.
feature_bullets: 16.3 Mega pixel APS-C CMOS sensor with integrated AD conversation circuitry
High sensitivity 80-51200 ISO range with excellent noise performance
Air gap free 3-Inch LCD with 921,000 dots of resolution
Pentax body based shake reduction stabilization system
Fully weather sealed and coldproof design and speedy 7FPS captures for fast action shots

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars47 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
